entities.name: SingleStore Client
entities.description: A package designed for interacting with the SingleStore API in Node.js environments.

entities.name: SingleStore API
entities.description: An API provided by SingleStore for database management and AI integration.

entities.name: Node.js

entities.name: Management API
entities.description: An API for managing SingleStore's services.

entities.name: AI integration
entities.description: The process of integrating artificial intelligence features with SingleStore.

entities.name: API key
entities.description: A key required to access certain APIs.

entities.name: OpenAI
entities.description: An AI research and deployment company.

entities.description: A package for integrating custom LLMs with SingleStore.

entities.name: workspaceGroup.get

entities.name: adminPassword
entities.description: A password for admin access, automatically generated if not provided.

relationships.description: The SingleStore Client is designed for interacting with the SingleStore API.
The SingleStore Client operates in Node.js environments.
The SingleStore Client provides access to the Management API.
The SingleStore Client supports AI integration.
Initializing the SingleStore Client may require an API key.
The SingleStore Client allows using custom LLMs instead of the pre-installed OpenAI.
For integrating custom LLMs, the documentation of @singlestore/ai is referred.
If the adminPassword is not provided, it is automatically generated.
